column4: Hello. How do I check if a package comes as default with Hardy ? Search hardy main ?
which one
/msg ubottu info packagename
thanks :)
if ubottu says a package is "important" does that mean it's installed in all Ubuntu systems ?
yes
ok, thanks. I'm trying to find a dialog maker for scripts installed by default. There whiptail for the console. I wonder if there's a GUI one ?
gnome is not exactly for old systems. try lubuntu
no, that's not what I asked, but thanks anyway. I need that particular distro. I just want to know about all the optimisations ... removing compiz, etc.
I'd start with minimal then build up
no, sorry. I know what you mean. But it was simpler just going through the full installation.
thanks :) I'll hv a look
vlc, mplayer to name two
tried those. They don't do the menu's properly
what do you mean properly. they work 100% fine here
that's interesting. So you have all menu options and perfectly looping background video ?
correct
what versions are you using ?
whatver version is current on 11.04
that's oneiric ?
I have no 3d effects going on here, if that is an issue.
